attacks.name: Amnesia
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent’s Active Pokémon’s attacks. That Pokémon can’t use that attack during your opponent’s next turn.

attacks.name: Swim
attacks.effect: If any of your opponent’s Pokémon have any Water Energy attached to them, you may do 90 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon instead of their Active Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
